results.content:
This is to be said, a CSS-Beginners Tutorial, that too very poorly told.

There is nothing like "Advanced CSS" in this. The beginers course is also, very limited chapters, that too awefully explained!

Very dissapointed with this course. Not much "proper data" or tutorial - with quality in this package.
